sections.title: Souldrinker (PZO9239) (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Souldrinker (PZO9239) class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiencies (Souldrinker (PZO9239))
sections.description: Souldrinkers gain proficiency only with their daemonic patron's favored weapon and no armor proficiencies.

sections.title: Spells per Day/Spells Known (Souldrinker (PZO9239))
sections.description: At indicated levels, souldrinker advances spellcasting in a previous class, gaining spells per day, spells known, and increased caster level but no other class benefits.

sections.title: Cacodaemon Familiar (Ex) (Souldrinker (PZO9239))
sections.description: At 1st level, the souldrinker gains a cacodaemon familiar as if having Improved Familiar feat, which devours any existing familiar without penalty.

sections.title: Daemonic Patron (Ex) (Souldrinker (PZO9239))
sections.description: At 1st level, souldrinker must choose one of the Four Horsemen as patron, a permanent choice that affects later abilities.

sections.title: Damned (Ex) (Souldrinker (PZO9239))
sections.description: When a souldrinker dies, her patron claims her soul, making resurrection require a caster level check (DC 10 + souldrinker level) or fail.

sections.title: Energy Drain (Sp) (Souldrinker (PZO9239))
sections.description: Touch attack as standard action that bestows negative levels (1 at 2nd level, 2 at 6th level), granting temporary hit points and scaling with critical hits.

sections.title: Soul Pool (Su) (Souldrinker (PZO9239))
sections.description: Pool of soul points gained from energy drain on qualifying targets, usable for item creation, staff recharge, spell slot recovery, and familiar replacement.

sections.title: Summon Cacodaemon (Sp) (Souldrinker (PZO9239))
sections.description: Once per day, summon 1d3 cacodaemons for 1 minute per class level, functioning as greater summon cacodaemon.

sections.title: Lesser Oblivion (Su) (Souldrinker (PZO9239))
sections.description: At 4th level, gain immunity based on patron: diseases (Pestilence), aging/ability penalties (Death), bleed/Strength penalties (War), or poisons/hunger (Famine).

sections.title: Oblivion (Sp) (Souldrinker (PZO9239))
sections.description: At 7th level, gain at-will spell-like ability costing 1 soul point per use, varying by patron (contagion, vampiric touch, rage, or bestow curse).

sections.title: Greater Oblivion (Sp) (Souldrinker (PZO9239))
sections.description: At 10th level, gain powerful at-will spell-like abilities costing 3 soul points per use, including creeping doom, fast healing 10, enhanced weapon bonding, or horrid wilting.
